goods.title: Timbuk2 Set Pack
goods.description: Sometimes your day doesn't end at the office. The Timbuk2速 Set Pack is the perfect bag for those who make a daily detours to mysterious locations throughout the day. Spacious backpack with tons of organization options. Large main compartment with zip pocket and organization panel. Laptop sleeve fits devices up to 15. Secondary compartment with floating divider for storing wet or soiled items.
